TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit IdentityConfiguration extends System.Object

summary.span: 定義控制 Windows Identity Foundation 行為之可設定屬性的集合。

span.span: Defines the collection of configurable properties controlling the behavior of the Windows Identity Foundation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果沒有組態檔，如果具名的區段不存在，或如果`element`是`null`，則會擲回任何例外狀況; 一組預設值改為載入執行個體。If there is no configuration file, if the named section does not exist, or if `element` is `null`, then no exception is thrown; instead the instance is loaded with a set of default values. 這個方法會呼叫載入語彙基元處理常式組態的方法。This method calls the method to load the token handler configuration.
